name: VR Train 3D Simulator
description:
VR Train 3D Simulator
VR Train Simulator 3D - This is a unique simulator subway trains in VR!
Try yourself in the role of electric train driver! You'll not only go to train in 3D mode, but will see the entire cabin!
Turn your phone and consider all the details in the cockpit!
Transport people very carefully!
Help people get to work, school or institution and get points for their work!
The more you will carry people or cargo, the more coins you accumulate!
Upon receipt of the coin open the new train compositions or subway!
Collect a full train park before your friends!
Driving the train a lot of fun!
In the New Year's Eve easily be late for the holiday, do not let it!
Thank you for using our simulator, leave us your comments and ratings, and we will make the game even better!
